data.text: @mchugh_ms I'm sorry to hear about your trouble in checking in for your upcoming flight from Ho Chi Minh to Singapore. So we could check this for you, please DM us your booking reference along with your full name. We'll see how we can assist. Thanks - Jerry

@noorghdr Hi there. Thanks for your tweet and I'm sorry to hear about this. So we can check this for you, please send us a DM with your name and email address associated to your account and we'll see how we can assist. Thanks - Josh

[SG] Fly to Da Nang to experience the Golden Bridge that everyone's talking about, from just S$73 one way all-in! National Day sale early access for Club Jetstar members now on at https://t.co/lHeqzahc1w https://t.co/7qWkycrdFd
@FlyWithEFI Hi there, thanks for the tweet. Just want to let you know that we have followed you. Thanks- Maye

urls.description: Need someone to speak to? Take a look at our list of contacts to find the number that is most relevant to your location. View contact numbers now.

data.text: @ylwknitsweater Hi there. Thanks for tagging us on your tweet about your in-flight meal onboard your recent Jetstar Asia flight. We appreciate your feedback and rest assured that we will inform our in-flight catering team for our improvement. Thanks - Josh
@dianne_janes 2/2 You may wish to follow up your feedback with our Baggage Services team here: https://t.co/9EhvszIuPz. Regards, Joie

@dianne_janes 1/2 I’m sorry to hear Dianne. Please be assured that we go to great lengths to take care of each piece of luggage, and to return all your belongings to you immediately after you've arrived at your destination. I can appreciate how upsetting it is if this doesn't happen.

@Goodridge20 I'm sorry to hear about this. So we could check this for you, please DM us your booking reference along with your full name and flight details. We'll see how we can assist. Thanks - Jerry

data.text: @bernard_szeto I’m sorry to hear about the delayed flight. It may help to know that we try to ensure all flights get away on time, however it's not always possible to do so due our strict safety standards. I sincerely apologise for any inconvenience or difficulties this meant for you. - Joie

data.text: @bernard_szeto 2/2 but please bear in mind that once a flight is delayed, it can be hard for us to predict exactly how long the delay will last. I sincerely apologise for the inconvenience this has caused you. Regards, Joie

@bernard_szeto 1/2 I apologise if you weren’t accurately updated on what was happening with your flight BL679. I know it doesn’t excuse the lack of service, or make up for the frustration experienced –

data.text: @bernard_szeto 1/2 Sorry to hear about your delayed flight Bernard. We certainly understand the importance of getting a flight away on time and we aim to do this with every one of our flights.

@smurfie_ahy 2/2 Thus, we only have limited control over the facilities provided to us by the airport. However, rest assured that we have taken note of your experience for our improvement. Thanks - Josh

data.text: @smurfie_ahy 1/2 Thanks for your tweet Meljoy and I'm sorry to hear about your experience whilst doing self-service check-in at Kuala Lumpur Airport. Please be aware that Jetstar is a tenant of the airport.
@pleyb0y1 2/2 Please this link for further information https://t.co/RT6jTkML1i. Thanks - Josh

@pleyb0y1 1/2 Hi there. Thanks for your tweet about checked baggage. It may help to know that you may bring as many bags as you can as long the combined weight of the bags must not exceed 40kgs. For safety purposes however, we require that no bag must not exceed 32kgs each.
@RamsayTaplin Thanks for your reply. It's best for you to keep checking our Travel Alerts page here https://t.co/aND4RYacsi. Thanks - Jerry

data.text: @RamsayTaplin Thanks for getting in touch. I've checked this for you and I can confirm that all flights to Indonesia is still operating as normal and is schedule to fly until further notice. Thanks - Jerry

@baller071415 Hi Jane, you can check in multiple bags on your flight from Manila-Singapore as long as the total weight of your items is within the checked baggage allowance that you've purchased. Further details on baggage can be found here - https://t.co/llsCfvz2XM. Thanks - Lee
@TravelCharlie8 Hey Charlie, thanks for the tag. We look forward to welcome you back on-board soon! Have a great day. Cheers - Lee

data.text: @Fendy_13 Hi Fendy, Thanks for the reply. As of this writing, we don’t have Friday Fare Frenzy available for flights from Manila to Osaka. You may wish to visit our website: https://t.co/HMHPPUNE3t for other great deals we offer. Regards, Joie
@Fendy_13 Hi @Fendy yes there is FFF sale today, for flights departing Singapore. Have a look here https://t.co/XMwmwbou99! - Tyler
@linuwari_yuyun You can login to our Manage Booking page here https://t.co/XSXDonFXn8 and click on the ‘Choose seats’ if you wish to allocate a seat on your flight. –M
@roysimangunsong Thanks for the tweet. I’m glad you enjoyed your flight with us. We hope to see on-board a Jetstar flight in the future. Regards, Joie

@roysimangunsong Hi there. Thanks for the tweet. It may help to know that the social media team are only able to respond to messages in English. Are you able to repost in English so we can assist? Regards, Joie

@gostorm1 Hi there, sorry to hear about your experience on our website. So we can check this for you, could you please DM us a screenshot of the error you are receiveing along with your booking reference and full name if involved? Thanks- Maye

@gostorm1 Hi there. Sorry to hear about this experience. Should you wish to add a baggage on your existing booking, kindly contact our Live Chat support via this link https://t.co/H2heXuqaRp. Thanks - Josh

@KayElle8 Sorry to hear about your experience whilst paying your booking using your voucher Kim. So I can check this for you, please send us a DM with your complete name, booking reference number and your voucher number and we'll see how we can assist. Thanks - Josh

@delvygusmiranto Hi Delvy, I've checked this for you and can confirm that for Soekarno-Hatta Jakarta International Airport you may proceed to Terminal 3. Please also visit https://t.co/I0cK24ZrTm. Thanks- Maye
@engsinguan1 Hi there. Thanks for your tweet and I'm sorry to hear about this. Please note that I have already responded to you on your other post. Thanks - Josh

@febryprast_ 2/2 If your baggage will exceed 15kgs, excess baggage rate will apply at IDR150,000 per kilo on top of the IDR400,000 you have paid initially. Please see this link https://t.co/0389cikKmL. Thanks - Josh

@febryprast_ 1/2 Hi Febry. Thanks for your tweet. It may help to know that if you purchased a Starter Fare wherein you don’t have a check baggage allowance, you need to pay IDR400,000 to upgrade your ticket for you to have a 15kgs of baggage allowance.
@Jimmy17_ Thanks for your reply. I sincerely apologise for any inconvenience this may have caused you. Thanks - Jerry
@Jimmy17_ 2/2 I suggest to clear your browsing cookies and cache to make sure you have the most updated version of our website. Let us know how you go. Thanks - Jerry

data.text: @JMiribel Sorry to hear that your flight 3K 212 was delayed. We try to ensure all flights get away on time, however it's not always possible to do so due to operational requirements and our strict safety standards. I sincerely apologise for any inconvenience this meant for you. Thanks - J

@Tiassri Thanks for getting in touch about your flight from Palembang to Singapore. So we could check this for you, please DM us your booking reference, full name along with more details about this. We'll see how we can assist. Thanks - Jerry
@iAm_RedSurio Thanks for the tweet Red. I hope you are able to secure some great deals with our Super Sale. Cheers, Joie

[SG] Jaw-dropping SALE! CGK $55, SGN $59, BKK $69, DPS/MNL $75, HKG $79, REP $85, TPE $99, OKA $139, MEL $169 + many more destinations! Hurry and book now at https://t.co/XMwmwbou99! https://t.co/5vBo0omWXk

@anthonyspiteri Thanks for getting in touch about your recent experience with us. Please know that electronic devices can be used whenever you would like on your Jetstar journey. However they will need to be switched to ‘flight mode’ once the aircraft doors are closed though. Thanks - Jerry

@piaaloraine Thanks for the reply Pia. I can see why you might have expected us to provide some complimentary refreshments in this situation but providing free food and drink to passengers affected by delays like this is not something we can do within our low-cost business model. Cheers, Joie
@piaaloraine It may help to know that the social media team are only able to respond to messages in English. Are you able to repost in English so we can assist? Regards, Joie 2/2

data.text: @piaaloraine Sorry to hear about the delayed flight Pia. We try to ensure all flights get away on time, however it's not always possible to do so due to our strict safety standards. I sincerely apologise for any inconvenience or difficulties this meant for you. 1/2

@Kirstenoir1 2/2 Some countries may also require 6 months passport validity and proof of onward or return travel. For more information I'd recommend contacting the embassy of the country you are visiting. I hope this information helps. Thanks - H

@Kirstenoir1 1/2 Hi. We're unable to advise on your personal passport and visa requirements. It is the passenger's responsibility at all times to have appropriate travel documentation and entry permits such as visas.

@Shanks_Siva Thanks for your reply. Please be advised that the report is only for internal review. HOwever, as advised, you could contact our Baggage Services team directly here: https://t.co/lBL1iu5SBJ for the latest updates on your baggage. Thanks - Jerry

@Shanks_Siva Thanks for you reply. Unfortunately, the information you have requested is commercially sensitive and not available to the public. Rest assured that we've passed on your feedback. Thanks - Jerry

@Shanks_Siva Thanks for your reply. I'm sorry to hear you weren't happy with the way our staff handled the situation though. As you may appreciate we do train all staff to be professional and friendly at all times. Rest assured I'll be passing this on to our Leadership team for review. - J

@Shanks_Siva 2/2 Unfortunately, the Social Media team don't have access to the systems and facilities the Baggage team use to trace customers bags. If you could contact our Baggage Services team directly here: https://t.co/lBL1iu5SBJ for the latest updates on your baggage. Thanks - Jerry

data.text: @Shanks_Siva 1/2 Sorry to hear about your luggage on your flight to Sydney via Singapore. Please be assured that we go to great lengths to take care of each piece of luggage, and to return all your belongings to you immediately after you've arrived at your destination.
@fustunkan Sorry to hear this Fulya. Could you please DM your booking reference so I can check this further and see how I can assist? –M

@DatoJulien Hi Dato, thanks for your tweet. I understand that your middle name was not included on your boarding pass. For us to check this further, could you please DM us with your booking reference and full name? Thanks- Maye
@BDjamma While we would love to grant every request, unfortunately we can’t support them all. As a low cost carrier, we are not in a position to offer sponsorship. –M

@adzubir Hi Adler, sorry to hear that you weren't able to travel on your flight from Jakarta. So we can further look into this for you, could you please DM us your booking reference and full name? Thanks- Maye

@BDjamma Hi there, thanks for your tweet. We receive so many requests like this, all of which are for very worthwhile causes. Can you please DM us your proposal and contact details, so we can forward this to the relevant team for review? Thanks-Maye

@daniel_kaye Hi Daniel, sorry to hear about your missing baggage on your flight from Singapore to Bangkok. If you can send through the details and photos to our Baggage Services team here: https://t.co/Ns3im9z6K3 they can formally review this and contact you directly. Thanks- Maye

@nikenhc Hi Niken. You may change your passport number if it expires before your flight. You may contact our Live Chat Team here: https://t.co/rZ0F7Snfv0 or alternatively you can send us your passport details via DM along with your booking reference number. I hope this helps. H

data.text: @vinamelody 1/2 Hi Vina. When travelling on a Starter Fare you can carry one piece of hand baggage up to 56cm x 36cm x 23cm per person plus one small item such as a laptop, purse or handbag. You may check here: https://t.co/V06mtl6D4l for more information.

@puiyee72324230 Hi there. Thanks for your tweet. It may help to know that you may makes changes in the name of the passenger on your booked ticket but this is subject for applicable fees such as change fee and fare difference. Please see link here https://t.co/1qfH61PgPV. Thanks - Josh

@CStewart1976 Thanks for your tweet, Chris. I've checked this for you and can confirm that the "Take me home" text was placed on the magazine to let people know that they can take it home. Hope this clarifies your query. :) Thanks - Josh

data.text: @bernadenevoss @warrenvoss 1/2 Your travel with us should always be relaxing and enjoyable and I'm sorry that wasn't the case on your husband's trip from Singapore to Vietnam. Our Economy Class seat pitch & leg room are comparable with our competitors.
@rebelsofneon Hi there, sorry to hear about this. So I can check this for you, can you send us a DM with your complete name and booking reference number and we’ll see how we can assist? Thanks – Josh
@AshlenRose Hi Ashlen. Sorry to hear about this. Could you provide your booking reference number with your full name and what could have gone wrong via DM so we can look into this? Thanks - H
@boeytatanoso Hi Boeyt, thanks for sharing this. That's a really cool shot from your window seat! Hope you have a great and safe flight. :) Thanks -Cy

@vienne_c Thanks for the tag. Please be reminded that we don't advise passenger to post personal details including your booking reference number publicly. So we can check this for you, please send us a DM. -Jerry
@Nhayuliana21 Thanks for getting in touch. As you may appreciate that I've responded to your DM. You may want to check your inbox. Thanks-Jerry

data.text: @irenemaligat Thanks for the tag. I hope you and your sister enjoyed your flight to Japan with us. Hope to see you on-board again soon. Cheers! Jerry :)

@byulmin96 Thanks for getting in touch. Please know that passenger aged 15 and 17 years old are allowed to travel alone and and should be able to meet our Independent traveler requirements here: https://t.co/7WGR6QqobY. Thanks-Jerry

@daniaar__ Thanks for getting in touch about your cousin plan trip with us. We're unable to advise on your cousin personal passport and visa requirements. Any enquiries regarding this matter must go directly to the embassy itself. Thanks-Jerry
@Liquorlipgun 2/2 Alternatively, you may find other payment methods here: https://t.co/O2KyvFhnEZ. Thanks -Cy

@Liquorlipgun 1/2 Hi there, thanks for your tweet. It may help to know that we still accept payments via 711 however, 711 and SingPost payments are not available on the Jetstar app or mobile site. You may wish to book using the full version of our website here: https://t.co/eL91S3m7FC.
[SG] SIN to PEN $37, CGK $43, HKT $45, SGN $52, RGN $55, PHN $63, CRK $65, TPE $89! Don't miss today's Friday Fare Frenzy! https://t.co/XMwmwbou99 https://t.co/KqcWa7DX98

@ayapanman55 Hi Aya, thanks for keeping in touch. Please be advised that for an international 3K flights check-in opens 2 hours before scheduled departure and closes 45 minutes before scheduled departure time. Please visit this link for more information https://t.co/dcz7pRfnEu. Thanks -Maye
@acidburn711 2/2 you have the most up to date version of our website. If you still get the same error, you may send us a screenshot and we will forward it to our Website team. Thanks - H

@acidburn711 1/2 Hi Jacquelyn. Sorry to hear this. As of this writing we don't have reported errors or system issues. You may reload the page by clicking the refresh button. Clearing your cache helps and you may also delete your browser cookies to ensure

@ayapanman55 Thanks for the tweet. I can confirm that the estimated departure time of flight JQ 116 from DPS to SIN is 12:05am. You may wish to check the flight status of the flight here: https://t.co/9hvadhsJwP - Joie

@travelology_ph Thanks for getting in touch. Please know that the currency of your fare will default to the currency of the country you will be departing from. So if you're booking a flight departing from Singapore the currency would be in Singapore Dollar. I hope this helps. Thanks-Jerry
@dewception Hi there, I’ve responded to your tweet via on our JetstarAirways account. Thanks - Lee
